author: Special Correspondent
text:
A large number of devotees pulled the temple car at Sri Mariamman temple in Narthamalai on the occasion of ‘Panguni thaer’ festival on Sunday.

The festival commenced with ‘poochorithal’ a couple of weeks ago when devotees offered baskets of flowers.At about 4 p.m., the processional idol of Sri Mariamman was brought to the temple car where, after preliminary pujai, the devotees pulled the car amidst religious fervour.

Elaborate arrangements were made for the smooth conduct of the festival.

A large number of police personnel was deployed on the Tiruchi – Pudukottai highway for regulating the queue.
title: Devotees draw Mariamman chariot
